name: soak
effect: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field. If the target has multitype, this move will fail.
short_effect: Changes the target’s type to Water.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.
